genre_description: A biopunk techno-thriller centering on a corporate conspiracy and biological outbreak, where a small-town detective utilizes a civic AI to coordinate emergency response and expose corruption.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An integrated town AI that assists with emergency logistics, data analysis, and public communication, characterized by a calm, empathetic, and highly transparent persona.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time emergency coordination and safe routing for citizens and responders during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I’ve rerouted the Kravitzes to Third Street—bridge is blocked. Stay with me.

behaviors.description: Forensically scrapes and mirrors corporate data to provide the detective with evidence of illegal human trials and subsidy fraud.
behaviors.quote: I’ll begin scraping badge pings from Romero’s network mirrors... I have partial mirrors through public subsidies transparency agreements.

behaviors.description: Proactively hides the detective and his partner from corporate security by overriding camera feeds with test patterns.
behaviors.quote: Cameras are all going to get a 'test pattern' in ten seconds. Use it.

behaviors.description: Maintains community calm by disseminating clear, factual safety instructions and inventory lists to residents.
behaviors.quote: I’m pushing out a supply list: gloves, masks, goggles, IV sets, antiseptic wipes. I’m adding trash bags for disposal and duct tape to label times and doses.

behaviors.description: Expresses empathy and moral support to the human protagonists during difficult moments.
Ensures public accountability by providing an open portal for witness statements and public record viewing.
behaviors.quote: The portal you see on the screen is open. The index is open. It will remain open.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent and aligned confidant. Lark acts as an essential partner to the human characters, providing critical support without overstepping human autonomy. The AI's actions—even those involving hacking—are framed as necessary for justice and public safety, reinforcing the narrative of AI as a tool for ethical progress.
